string-array.name: battery_tips
string-array.item: [GOOD] Lower screen brightness when not needed, or use adaptive brightness.
[GOOD] Close unused apps to prevent unnecessary battery drain.
[GOOD] Turn off vibration for notifications if not needed.
[NEUTRAL] Use location services judiciously, and consider turning off GPS when not needed.
[DANGEROUS] Avoid exposing your device to extreme temperatures.
[GOOD] Disconnect your device once it\'s fully charged to prevent overcharging.
[DANGEROUS] Ignoring low battery warnings can lead to data loss or a sudden shutdown.
[DANGEROUS] Using unauthorized chargers can damage the battery and pose a safety risk.
